entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
